application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details pursuant to condition 7 (Water reduction), condition 12 (Air Quality and Dust Management Plan), conditions 14(a) (Arboricultural Impact Assessment and an Arboricultural Method Statement),  14(b) (Full Details of biodiversity enhancements), 14(c) (The exact location of 4 the bee bricks into the front boundary), 14(d) (Details of access and egress point for hedgehogs), 14(e) (Details of the installation of 2 x sparrow boxes on either gable end of to the eaves of the house), condition 16 (Materials) and condition 17 (Boundary treatment)  atttached to planning permission reference 213515, granted 01/09/2022.
